sense.name: government tax imposed on some imports and exports
sense.examples: Higher tariffs between these nations may result in a trade war. How much is the tariff on that luxury import sportscar?

sense.name: a list or schedule of government import/export taxes
sense.examples: The declaration form explains the tariff on different amounts and types of goods.

sense.name: a table of charges at a hotel or restaurant
sense.examples: The tariff on the hotel room was listed in small print at the bottom of the form. The menu indicated the tariff and gratuity that is automatically factored in.
